name: ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialDescriptor
desc: An object that holds public key credential transport information.

items.name: init(credentialID: Data, transports: [ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialDescriptor.Transport])
items.desc: Creates the object with the credential ID and the array of transports.

items.name: struct ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialDescriptor.Transport
items.desc: A structure that defines the security key credential transport type.
